title: Update Rust crate chrono to 0.4.20
body:
[![Mend Renovate](https://app.renovatebot.com/images/banner.svg)](https://renovatebot.com)

This PR contains the following updates:

| Package | Type | Update | Change |
|---|---|---|---|
| [chrono](https://togithub.com/chronotope/chrono) | dependencies | patch | `0.4.19` -> `0.4.20` |

---

### Release Notes

<details>
<summary>chronotope/chrono</summary>

### [`v0.4.20`](https://togithub.com/chronotope/chrono/blob/HEAD/CHANGELOG.md#​0420-unreleased)

[Compare Source](https://togithub.com/chronotope/chrono/compare/v0.4.19...v0.4.20)

-   Add more formatting documentation and examples.
-   Add support for microseconds timestamps serde serialization/deserialization ([#​304](https://togithub.com/chronotope/chrono/issues/304))
-   Fix `DurationRound` is not TZ aware ([#​495](https://togithub.com/chronotope/chrono/issues/495))
-   Implement `DurationRound` for `NaiveDateTime`
-   Implement `std::iter::Sum` for `Duration`
-   Add `DateTime::from_local()` to construct from given local date and time ([#​572](https://togithub.com/chronotope/chrono/issues/572))
-   Add a function that calculates the number of years elapsed between now and a given `Date` or `DateTime` ([#​557](https://togithub.com/chronotope/chrono/issues/557))
-   Correct build for wasm32-unknown-emscripten target ([#​568](https://togithub.com/chronotope/chrono/issues/568))
-   Change `Local::now()` and `Utc::now()` documentation from "current date" to "current date and time" ([#​647](https://togithub.com/chronotope/chrono/issues/647))
-   Fix `duration_round` panic on rounding by `Duration::zero()` ([#​658](https://togithub.com/chronotope/chrono/issues/658))
-   Add optional rkyv support.
-   Add support for microseconds timestamps serde serialization for `NaiveDateTime`.
-   Add support for optional timestamps serde serialization for `NaiveDateTime`.
-   Fix build for wasm32-unknown-emscripten ([@​yu-re-ka](https://togithub.com/yu-re-ka) [#​593](https://togithub.com/chronotope/chrono/issues/593))
-   Make `ParseErrorKind` public and available through `ParseError::kind()` ([#​588](https://togithub.com/chronotope/chrono/issues/588))
-   Implement `DoubleEndedIterator` for `NaiveDateDaysIterator` and `NaiveDateWeeksIterator`
-   Fix panicking when parsing a `DateTime` ([@​botahamec](https://togithub.com/botahamec))
-   Add support for getting week bounds based on a specific `NaiveDate` and a `Weekday` ([#​666](https://togithub.com/chronotope/chrono/issues/666))
-   Remove libc dependency from Cargo.toml.
-   Add the `and_local_timezone` method to `NaiveDateTime`
-   Fix the behavior of `Duration::abs()` for negative durations with non-zero nanos
-   Add compatibility with rfc2822 comments ([#​733](https://togithub.com/chronotope/chrono/issues/733))
-   Make `js-sys` and `wasm-bindgen` enabled by default when target is `wasm32-unknown-unknown` for ease of API discovery
-   Add the `Months` struct and associated `Add` and `Sub` impls

</details>

---
